title: Connect 11
content: The strategy game that goes to 11!
details: I want to create a game that is a take on a modern classic, connect 4.  Wouldn't it be great if you could take this game to 11.  Imagine having a mega-huge version of this game for bars and parties.

title: Fork Chops
content: Cover any eating situation on-the-go with Fork Chops.
details: Even when you're away from home, you have your standards—and flimsy plastic takeout utensils just will not do. The reusable ForkChops are not only more stylish, the three-in-one eating utensil—which includes a fork, knife, and chopsticks—covers most any meal you will encounter.
